name: Sniper Alpha Squad 3D
description:
Sniper Alpha Squad 3D!!!
Pull trigger & take headshots as extreme assassination gun shooter to neutralize all threats in roof chase. A lone sniper fatal game: military shooter shoots & kills assassins best!
Features
1. Efficient controls
2. Amazing sound effects
3. Sniper scope view
4. Play anytime anywhere without internet.
5. Ultra realistic 3d graphics
6. Challenging shooting game
